amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of Defense to design and produce a military service medal to honor retired and former members of the Armed Forces who are radiation-exposed veterans.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 43 printed in House Report 115-217 to require the Secretary of Defense to design and produce a military service medal to honor retired and former members of the Armed Forces who are radiation-exposed veterans.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 424 - 0 (Roll no. 376).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. McGovern.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A033) Agreed to by recorded vote: 424 - 0 (Roll no. 376).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
